About Us

Saga is a technology company dedicated to building smart solutions for modern communities. Our flagship product, Sahabat Warga, empowers neighborhoods to manage their day-to-day operations efficiently and transparently.

Founded in 2023, we have grown to serve hundreds of residential communities across Indonesia. Our mission is to create safer, more connected, and happier neighborhoods through technology.

Our Vision

To be the leading community management platform in Southeast Asia, setting the standard for digital living.

Our Values

  • Community First: We build for the people who use our products.
  • Transparency: We believe in open communication and honest business practices.
  • Innovation: We continuously improve and adapt to changing needs.
Sahabat Warga

Solusi digital untuk komunitas modern. Kelola lingkungan jadi lebih transparan dan efisien.
